definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: exile—Is 20:4 + 9 t.; [[גׇּלֻת]] Ob:Ob 20, Ob:Ob 20; sf. [[גׇּלוּתִי]] Is 45:13, [[גׇּלוּתֵינוּ]] Ez Eze 33:21, Eze 40:1 (Qames unchangeable);—
abs. exile, 2Ki 25:27, Je 52:31, Ez Eze 1:2, Eze 33:21, Eze 40:1, Am 1:6, Am 1:9, Ob:Ob 20, Ob:Ob 20.
coll. exiles, [[גלות כושׁ]] Is 20:4, [[גלות יהודה]] Je 24:5, Je 28:4, Je 29:22, Je 40:1, [[גלותי ישׁלח]] he shall let my exiles (Yahweh's) go free Is 45:13; vid. Lag:Arm. Stud. § 445.
